name: AVAudioBuffer
desc: An object that represents a buffer of audio data with a format.

items.name: var format: AVAudioFormat
items.desc: The format of the audio in the buffer.

items.name: var audioBufferList: UnsafePointer<AudioBufferList>
items.desc: The buffer’s underlying audio buffer list.

items.name: var mutableAudioBufferList: UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioBufferList>
items.desc: A mutable version of the buffer’s underlying audio buffer list.

items.name: class AVAudioCompressedBuffer
items.desc: An object that represents an audio buffer that you use for compressed audio formats.

items.name: class AVAudioPCMBuffer
items.desc: An object that represents an audio buffer you use with PCM audio formats.
